text.0:
A video claiming to show ballots from the US elections found dumped in bushes has been shared hundreds of times in Facebook posts. However, the video has nothing to do with the elections. #FakeNews #USElections2020 #MailInBallots

https://t.co/j4UJj2v8Zf
text.1:
In a major shift in stance by the Reserve Bank of India, an internal working group [IWG] has suggested allowing corporations and large industrial groups to operate banks. Read all details explained here. #RBI #BOOMFactCheck #Corporates @RBI

https://t.co/UpLd2ewt7C
text.2:
Social media posts are sharing a video of Canadian PM @JustinTrudeau to justify a baseless conspiracy theory called #TheGreatReset about a plan by global elites to control the population & bypass democracy using #COVID19 pandemic as an excuse. #FakeNews

https://t.co/baj7nTDxR2
text.3:
Several Facebook pages and verified Twitter handles shared posts claiming that the Indian Army's air strikes on terror launchpads in PoK resulted in the death of around 85 terrorists. This claim is false. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #IndianArmy @adgpi 

https://t.co/igK56ujK4o
text.4:
As President Donald Trump unsuccessfully fights the results of the presidential election in courts, his campaign released the names of four dead Georgians who allegedly voted, suggesting fraud. This is false. #FakeNews #Georgia #USElectionResults

https://t.co/QP0knDHwoV
text.5:
A month after its #SolidarityTrial showed that Remdesivir is ineffective in reducing #COVID19 mortality, the World Health Organization has now updated its guidelines to advise against the use of #Remdesivir in treating COVID-19. @WHO 

https://t.co/ALRJlkCDO3
text.6:
A photo of an article reporting that the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) "admits there is no COVID-19" has been shared in multiple Facebook posts. This claim is false. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus

https://t.co/0QGct58EAQ
text.7:
Contempt of court is a legal mechanism to protect the judiciary from motivated and unwarranted attacks and punishes those who attempt to lower its authority. Read my explainer in @boomlive_in on this issue. 

https://t.co/63GiY0AwXF
text.8:
Ob-Gyn Dr Christiane Northrup falsely claims that metals used in the coronavirus vaccine will create antennas in the body which will be detected by 5G technology, among other outlandish claims. #FakeNews #COVID19 #coronavirus #BOOMFactCheck

https://t.co/1iSDZP6E9i
text.9:
A video from 2014 of two foreigners reciting vedic chants is being shared with a false claim it shows the #WhiteHouse  holding a recital of Hindu shlokas for #JoeBiden, the US President-elect, on his first day of office. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/wER03ONAB9
text.11:
CJI Bobde's observation in #SiddiqueKappan's case has invited many comments and observations. Justice Madan Lokur, retired Supreme Court judge said, "the Supreme Court is attempting to off-load some of its work." #SupremeCourtofIndia #Article32

https://t.co/sJu2oiZANf
text.12:
"Publication of personal details often might have a chilling effect on the right to marry. Couples are asked to waive the right to privacy to exercise the right to marry," the plea filed by law student Nandini Praveen in the SC reads. #LoveJihad

https://t.co/kWYQ1PJUbn
text.13:
Since 1999, there have been at least 12 banks that have been put under a moratorium by the Reserve Bank of India. #LakshmiVilasBank became the latest to be at the receiving end of this step due to its failing financial health. #moratorium #RBI 

https://t.co/84ic4rYPK4
text.14:
A clip showing a Congress leader's daughter talking to the media during the #MadhyaPradesh by-poll is being shared falsely claiming that she is a poll officer talking about election rigging during the #BiharElections. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/HORQ9gIPD4
text.15:
India crossed 9 million #COVID19 cases after reporting 45,882 new cases in the last 24 hours. The increase from 70 lakh to 80 lakh cases took 18 days while the increase from 80 lakh to 90 lakh cases took 21 days. @MoHFW_INDIA #coronavirus #COVID19India 

https://t.co/qtA4c2psqq
text.16:
"Big Breaking: In PoK, Indian Air Force did another air strike and killed many terrorists and their training camps destroyed by the Indian Air Force." - this claim is false. @IAF_MCC #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews #indianairforce

https://t.co/9aPxfBLrZp
text.17: #BOOMExplains: What are the privacy concerns while using WhatsApp Pay with regards to sharing data with Facebook? Vedant Sangit, Head of Education, IndiaForensic (@indiaforensic) explains the need for adherence to data protection laws that other online payment gateways follow. https://t.co/uiWWloX7RX
text.18:
A video showing Yogi Adityanath lighting a firecracker at his residence in August is viral with netizens falsely linking it to the #crackerban in various states including #UttarPradesh, to curb alarming levels of air pollution. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/NITQwkyBMx
text.19:
SG Tushar Mehta representing the UP govt counters claims that KeralaJourno SiddiqueKappan is illegally confined. "He was arrested & remanded by a competent court. His bail was heard for 9 days, now matter should be heard by the high court," he submits in the SC. 

@boomlive_in
text.20:
India Today and Aaj Tak tweeted an edited video of a young Indonesian boy happily grooving to a popular song, Dama Dam Mast Qalandar. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews 

https://t.co/4vOe5uIzHV
text.21:
"As far as commercial banks are concerned, even if the bank is run badly, even if RBI is taking longer than it should have taken, depositors' money will be protected," says veteran banking analyst and journalist Tamal Bandyopadhyay to @govindethiraj.

https://t.co/Ecq1jm744B
text.22:
An old image of Union Home Minister #AmitShah meeting West Bengal Chief Minister #MamataBanerjee at Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik's home has resurfaced with claims that the two met to discuss upcoming Bengal elections. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/YaD2GcT8LR
text.24: #BOOMExplains: Does WhatsApp Pay have a higher risk of fraud than any other online payment app in India? Vedant Sangit, Head of Education, IndiaForensic (@indiaforensic) explains the risks of using WhatsApp Pay. https://t.co/fQ97pra5lZ
text.25:
BOOM received a video on its WhatsApp helpline wherein a woman insinuates that the #oxfordvaccine uses lung cells of an aborted fetus. She further urges Christians who are pro-life to not partake in the administration of this vaccine #Astrazeneca #Vaccines
https://t.co/kzjcxm4CjF
text.26: #BOOMExplains: Is depositors money safe in commercial banks? "Money in commercial banks is safe. Since early 1990's, no commercial bank has been allowed to fail in India," says veteran banking analyst and journalist Tamal Bandyopadhyay to BOOM's @govindethiraj. https://t.co/zE7uNXlEys
text.27:
Good morning, India. This is our top read today:
An eight-year-old video showing protestors attack the German embassy in Sudan is being peddled as a recent attack on the French embassy in the country. #BOOMFactCheck #FakeNews

https://t.co/m6oV6MeMGf
